page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CLAIRE.
page.content: 9.00 breakfast: grapefruit,toast and a cup of tea. 09.45 I read a joke book. This boy said to his father,"What does L stand for?"His father said "Learner".The boy said,"Does GB mean getting better?" 10.15 I got ready for Chapel(Yeolmbridge anniversary). We set off at 10.45 and I was sitting in Chapel at 11.00.At 12.00 we went home and sat down for dinner at 12.30;Mum prepared it.We had roast meat,carrots, potatoes,peas and for afters we had trifle.1.30 I listened to the radio then I watched television until 2.45 then I rode my bike. 3.00 I played the piano then watched Tv.until 4.30 when I had a cup of tea,cake and a biscuit. I helped Mum to wash the dishes.5.00 Irode my bike.6.00 watched TV.6.30 spoke to Gran. on the 'phone,watched TV.7.30 had a bath. 8.00 had my supper and watched TV. 9.00 I went to bed.
